verses.verse: וְאֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> ve-'El-leh now these דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> div-Rei words דָוִ֖ד <WH1732> da-Vid of David הָאַֽחֲרֹנִ֑ים <WH314> ha-'a-cha-ro-Nim; Now these [be] the last נְאֻ֧ם <WH5002> ne-'Um said דָּוִ֣ד <WH1732> da-Vid David בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יִשַׁ֗י <WH3448> yi-Shai, of Jesse וּנְאֻ֤ם <WH5002> u-ne-'Um said הַגֶּ֙בֶר֙ <WH1397> hag-Ge-ver and the man הֻ֣קַם <WH6965> Hu-kam [who was] raised up עָ֔ל <WH5920> 'Al, on high מְשִׁ֙יחַ֙ <WH4899> me-Shi-ach the anointed אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei of the God יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko, of Jacob וּנְעִ֖ים <WH5273> u-ne-'Im and the sweet זְמִר֥וֹת <WH2158> ze-mi-Rot psalmist יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> Ru-ach The Spirit יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD דִּבֶּר־ <WH1696> dib-ber- spake בִּ֑י Bi; וּמִלָּת֖וֹ <WH4405> u-mil-la-To by me and his word עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- was on לְשׁוֹנִֽי׃ <WH3956> le-sho-Ni. [was] in my tongue

אָמַר֙ <WH559> 'a-Mar said אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei The God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel לִ֥י li דִבֶּ֖ר <WH1696> dib-Ber spake צ֣וּר <WH6697> tzur the Rock יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel מוֹשֵׁל֙ <WH4910> mo-Shel to me He that ruleth בָּאָדָ֔ם <WH120> ba-'a-Dam, over men צַדִּ֕יק <WH6662> tzad-Dik [must be] just מוֹשֵׁ֖ל <WH4910> mo-Shel ruling יִרְאַ֥ת <WH3374> yir-'At in the fear אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> E-lo-Him. of God

וּכְא֥וֹר <WH216> u-che-'or And [he shall be] as the light בֹּ֖קֶר <WH1242> Bo-ker of the morning יִזְרַח־ <WH2224> yiz-rach- riseth שָׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH8121> Sha-mesh; [when] the sun בֹּ֚קֶר <WH1242> Bo-ker [even] a morning לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo without עָב֔וֹת <WH5645> a-Vot, clouds מִנֹּ֥גַהּ <WH5051> min-No-gah by clear shining מִמָּטָ֖ר <WH4306> mi-ma-Tar after rain דֶּ֥שֶׁא <WH1877> De-she [as] the tender grass מֵאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> me-'A-retz. [springing] out of the earth

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- Truly לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- not כֵ֥ן <WH3651> chen so בֵּיתִ֖י <WH1004> bei-Ti Although my house עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with אֵ֑ל <WH410> 'El; [be] not so with God כִּי֩ <WH3588> ki indeed בְרִ֨ית <WH1285> ve-Rit covenant עוֹלָ֜ם <WH5769> o-Lam with me an everlasting שָׂ֣ם <WH7760> sam yet he hath made לִ֗י Li, עֲרוּכָ֤ה <WH6186> 'a-ru-Chah ordered בַכֹּל֙ <WH3605> vak-Kol all וּשְׁמֻרָ֔ה <WH8104> u-she-mu-Rah, in all [things] and sure כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- indeed כָל־ <WH3605> chol things יִשְׁעִ֥י <WH3468> yish-'I for [this is] all my salvation וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol for all חֵ֖פֶץ <WH2656> Che-fetz and all [my] desire כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- indeed לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo make not יַצְמִֽיחַ׃ <WH6779> yatz-Mi-ach. although he make [it] not to grow

וּבְלִיַּ֕עַל <WH1100> u-ve-li-Ya-'al But [the sons] of Belial כְּק֥וֹץ <WH6975> ke-Kotz [shall be] all of them as thorns מֻנָ֖ד <WH5074> mu-Nad thrust away כֻּלָּ֑הַם <WH3605> kul-La-ham; every כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- Because לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo cannot בְיָ֖ד <WH3027> ve-Yad with hands יִקָּֽחוּ׃ <WH3947> yik-Ka-chu. because they cannot be taken

וְאִישׁ֙ <WH376> ve-'Ish But the man יִגַּ֣ע <WH5060> yig-Ga' [that] shall touch בָּהֶ֔ם ba-Hem, יִמָּלֵ֥א <WH4390> yim-ma-Le them must be fenced בַרְזֶ֖ל <WH1270> var-Zel with iron וְעֵ֣ץ <WH6086> ve-'Etz and the staff חֲנִ֑ית <WH2595> cha-Nit; of a spear וּבָאֵ֕שׁ <WH784> u-va-'Esh with fire שָׂר֥וֹף <WH8313> sa-Rof and they shall be utterly יִשָּׂרְפ֖וּ <WH8313> yis-sa-re-Fu burned בַּשָּֽׁבֶת׃ <WH7675> bash-Sha-vet. in the [same] place פ Peh

אֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These שְׁמ֥וֹת <WH8034> she-Mot These [be] the names הַגִּבֹּרִ֖ים <WH1368> hag-gib-bo-Rim of the mighty men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom לְדָוִ֑ד <WH1732> le-da-Vid; whom David יֹשֵׁ֨ב <WH3427> yo-Shev that sat בַּשֶּׁ֜בֶת <WH7675> bash-She-vet place תַּחְכְּמֹנִ֣י׀ <WH8461> tach-ke-mo-Ni had The Tachmonite רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> rosh chief הַשָּׁלִשִׁ֗י <WH7991> hash-sha-li-Shi, among the captains ה֚וּא <WH1931> hu he עֲדִינ֣וֹ <WH5722> a-di-No the same [was] Adino; הָעֶצְנֹו ha-'etz-no כהָֽעֶצְנִ֔י <WH6112> ha-'etz-Ni, Eznite קעַל־ <WH5921> 'al- because שְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <WH8083> she-mo-Neh [he lift up his spear] against eight מֵא֛וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred חָלָ֖ל <WH2491> cha-Lal whom he slew בְּפַ֥עַם <WH6471> be-Fa-'am time; אֶחָד 'e-chad כאֶחָֽת׃ <WH259> 'e-Chat. a קס sa-Mek

וְאַחֲרֹו ve-'a-cha-ro כוְאַחֲרָ֛יו <WH310> ve-'a-cha-Rav after that קאֶלְעָזָ֥ר <WH499> 'el-'a-Zar him [was] Eleazar בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son; דֹּדִי do-di כדֹּדֹ֖ו <WH1734> do-Do Dodo קבֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אֲחֹחִ֑י <WH266> 'a-cho-Chi; the Ahohite בִּשְׁלֹשָׁ֨ה <WH7969> bish-lo-Shah [one] of the three; גִּבֹּרִים gib-bo-rim כהַגִּבֹּרִ֜ים <WH1368> hag-gib-bo-Rim champion קעִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with דָּוִ֗ד <WH1732> da-Vid, with David בְּחָֽרְפָ֤ם <WH2778> be-cha-re-Fam when they defied בַּפְּלִשְׁתִּים <WH6430> bap-pe-lish-tim the Philistines נֶאֶסְפוּ־ <WH622> ne-'es-fu- [that] were there gathered together שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> sham there לַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> lam-mil-cha-Mah, to battle וַֽיַּעֲל֖וּ <WH5927> vai-ya-'a-Lu were gone away אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> 'ish and the men יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

ה֣וּא <WH1931> hu He קָם֩ <WH6965> kam He arose וַיַּ֨ךְ <WH5221> vai-Yach and smote בַּפְּלִשְׁתִּ֜ים <WH6430> bap-pe-lish-Tim the Philistines עַ֣ד׀ <WH5704> 'ad against כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- until יָגְעָ֣ה <WH3021> ya-ge-'Ah was weary יָד֗וֹ <WH3027> ya-Do, his hand וַתִּדְבַּ֤ק <WH1692> vat-tid-Bak clave יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> ya-Do and his hand אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַחֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> ha-Che-rev, unto the sword וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as wrought יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh and the LORD תְּשׁוּעָ֥ה <WH8668> te-shu-'Ah victory גְדוֹלָ֖ה <WH1419> ge-do-Lah a great בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom that day הַה֑וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu; he וְהָעָ֛ם <WH5971> ve-ha-'Am and the people יָשֻׁ֥בוּ <WH7725> ya-Shu-vu returned אַחֲרָ֖יו <WH310> 'a-cha-Rav after אַךְ־ <WH389> 'ach- only לְפַשֵּֽׁט׃ <WH6584> le-fash-Shet. him only to spoil ס sa-Mek

וְאַחֲרָ֛יו <WH310> ve-'a-cha-Rav And after שַׁמָּ֥א <WH8037> sham-Ma Shamma בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son אָגֵ֖א <WH89> 'a-Ge of Agee הָרָרִ֑י <WH2043> ha-ra-Ri; the Hararite וַיֵּאָסְפ֨וּ <WH622> vai-ye-'a-se-Fu were gathered together פְלִשְׁתִּ֜ים <WH6430> fe-lish-Tim And the Philistines לַחַיָּ֗ה <WH2416> la-chai-Yah, into a troop וַתְּהִי־ <WH1961> vat-te-hi- become שָׁ֞ם <WH8033> sham where חֶלְקַ֤ת <WH2513> chel-Kat where was a piece הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <WH7704> has-sa-Deh of ground מְלֵאָ֣ה <WH4395> me-le-'Ah fruit עֲדָשִׁ֔ים <WH5742> 'a-da-Shim, of lentiles וְהָעָ֥ם <WH5971> ve-ha-'Am and the people נָ֖ס <WH5127> nas fled מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei from פְלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <WH6430> fe-lish-Tim. the Philistines

וַיִּתְיַצֵּ֤ב <WH3320> vai-yit-yatz-Tzev But he stood בְּתוֹךְ־ <WH8432> be-toch- in the midst הַֽחֶלְקָה֙ <WH2513> ha-chel-Kah of the ground וַיַּצִּילֶ֔הָ <WH5337> vai-yatz-tzi-Le-ha, and defended וַיַּ֖ךְ <WH5221> vai-Yach it and slew אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> pe-lish-Tim; the Philistines וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as wrought יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh and the LORD תְּשׁוּעָ֥ה <WH8668> te-shu-'Ah victory גְדוֹלָֽה׃ <WH1419> ge-do-Lah. a great ס sa-Mek

וַיֵּרְד֨וּ <WH3381> vai-ye-re-Du went down; שְׁלֹשִׁים she-lo-shim כשְׁלֹשָׁ֜ה <WH7970> she-lo-Shah of the thirty קמֵהַשְּׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> me-hash-she-lo-Shim of the thirty רֹ֗אשׁ <WH7218> Rosh, chief וַיָּבֹ֤אוּ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo-'u and came אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- in קָצִיר֙ <WH7105> ka-Tzir in the harvest time אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> da-Vid, to David אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מְעָרַ֖ת <WH4631> me-'a-Rat unto the cave עֲדֻלָּ֑ם <WH5725> 'a-dul-Lam; of Adullam וְחַיַּ֣ת <WH2416> ve-chai-Yat and the troop פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> pe-lish-Tim, of the Philistines חֹנָ֖ה <WH2583> cho-Nah pitched בְּעֵ֥מֶק <WH6010> be-'E-mek in the valley רְפָאִֽים׃ <WH7497> re-fa-'Im. of Rephaim

וְדָוִ֖ד <WH1732> ve-da-Vid And David אָ֣ז <WH227> 'az was then בַּמְּצוּדָ֑ה <WH4686> bam-me-tzu-Dah; [was] then in an hold וּמַצַּ֣ב <WH4673> u-matz-Tzav and the garrison פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> pe-lish-Tim, of the Philistines אָ֖ז <WH227> 'az was then בֵּ֥ית beit לָֽחֶם׃ <WH1035> La-chem. [was] then [in] Bethlehem

וַיִּתְאַוֶּ֥ה <WH183> vai-yit-'av-Veh longed דָוִ֖ד <WH1732> da-Vid And David וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> vai-yo-Mar; and said מִ֚י <WH4310> mi Oh יַשְׁקֵ֣נִי <WH8248> yash-Ke-ni Oh that one would give me drink מַ֔יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim, of the water מִבֹּ֥אר <WH877> mib-Bor the well בֵּֽית־ beit- לֶ֖חֶם <WH1035> Le-chem of Bethlehem אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בַּשָּֽׁעַר׃ <WH8179> bash-Sha-'ar. which [is] by the gate

וַיִּבְקְעוּ֩ <WH1234> vai-yiv-ke-'U brake through שְׁלֹ֨שֶׁת <WH7969> she-Lo-shet And the three הַגִּבֹּרִ֜ים <WH1368> hag-gib-bo-Rim mighty men בְּמַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> be-ma-cha-Neh the host פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <WH6430> fe-lish-Tim, of the Philistines וַיִּֽשְׁאֲבוּ־ <WH7579> vai-yish-'a-vu- and drew מַ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> ma-yim water מִבֹּ֤אר <WH877> mib-Bor the well בֵּֽית־ beit- לֶ֙חֶם֙ <WH1035> le-chem of Bethlehem אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בַּשַּׁ֔עַר <WH8179> bash-Sha-'ar, that [was] by the gate וַיִּשְׂא֖וּ <WH5375> vai-yis-'U and took וַיָּבִ֣אוּ <WH935> vai-ya-Vi-'u [it] and brought אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> da-Vid; [it] to David וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> ve-Lo not אָבָה֙ <WH14> 'a-Vah nevertheless he would לִשְׁתּוֹתָ֔ם <WH8354> lish-to-Tam, not drink וַיַּסֵּ֥ךְ <WH5258> vai-yas-Sech thereof but poured it out אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> 'o-Tam לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. unto the LORD

וַיֹּ֡אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said חָלִילָה֩ <WH2486> cha-li-Lah Be it far לִּ֨י li יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh from me O LORD מֵעֲשֹׂ֣תִי <WH6213> me-'a-So-ti that I should do זֹ֗את <WH2063> Zot, likewise הֲדַ֤ם <WH1818> ha-Dam this [is not this] the blood הָֽאֲנָשִׁים֙ <WH582> ha-'a-na-Shim of the men הַהֹלְכִ֣ים <WH1980> ha-ho-le-Chim that went בְּנַפְשׁוֹתָ֔ם <WH5315> be-naf-sho-Tam, any וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo not אָבָ֖ה <WH14> 'a-Vah would לִשְׁתּוֹתָ֑ם <WH8354> lish-to-Tam; not drink אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These עָשׂ֔וּ <WH6213> 'a-Su, it These things did שְׁלֹ֖שֶׁת <WH7969> she-Lo-shet these three הַגִּבֹּרִֽים׃ <WH1368> hag-gib-bo-Rim. mighty men ס sa-Mek

וַאֲבִישַׁ֞י <WH52> va-'a-vi-Shai And Abishai אֲחִ֣י׀ <WH251> 'a-Chi the brother יוֹאָ֣ב <WH3097> yo-'Av of Joab בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son צְרוּיָ֗ה <WH6870> tze-ru-Yah, of Zeruiah ה֚וּא <WH1931> hu he רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> rosh was chief; הַשְּׁלֹשִׁי hash-she-lo-shi כהַשְּׁלֹשָׁ֔ה <WH7992> hash-she-lo-Shah, third part קוְהוּא֙ <WH1931> ve-Hu and he עוֹרֵ֣ר <WH5782> o-Rer And he lifted up אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- חֲנִית֔וֹ <WH2595> cha-ni-To, his spear עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> she-Losh against three מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred חָלָ֑ל <WH2491> cha-Lal; [and] slew וְלוֹ־ ve-lo- שֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> shem [them] and had the name בַּשְּׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> bash-she-lo-Shah. among three
